availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: S. A. Hagarty (Boone County, KY attorney)

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, attorney and toll road keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Catharine H. Hagarty. Attorney in Florence, Kentucky, in 1860. Toll road keeper of the Florence Pike in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Florence, p. 251
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 17, Boone County, Kentucky, 1865, (Accessed via ancestry.com June 17, 2019).
